response.overview: Following a bomb scare in the 1960s that locked the Webers into their bomb shelter for 35 years, Adam now ventures forth into Los Angeles to obtain food and supplies for his family, and a non-mutant wife for himself.
response.tagline: She'd never met anyone like him. He's never met anyone... Period.
response.title: Blast from the Past

crew.name: Jody Levin
crew.job: Executive In Charge Of Post Production

results.name: Blast from the Past (1999) ORIGINA TRAILER
